ClientSide.controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientSide.controllers.LoginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client.ClientStatusHandler, Client.MessageReceiveHandler, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, Client.ClientStatusHandler, Client.MessageReceiveHandler
    LoginController: Create first connection with the server and login to the system, the controller related to 'Login.FXML' and 'LoginSettings.FXML' .
